title: "Scenic coastal highway attracts tourists for self-driving tour during holiday in Hainan"
excerpt: "People have fun at Mulan Bay during self-driving tours along a scenic coastal highway in Wenchang, south China's Hainan Province, Oct. 4, 2023. The opened section of the scenic coastal highway in Hainan have attracted numerous tourists for self-driving tours during the Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day holiday. (Xinhua/Pu Xiaoxu)"
